name: RPG Kill Kill Kill
description: Find five fabled gems by killing everyone! Enter a small world where a variety of characters hold treasure and defend it with arcane abilities. Choose your opponents carefully! Most of the characters you meet will be undefeatable until you learn the various aspects of the forces they use. The NPC's will speak before they attack you when you bump into them for some clues about who you might be able to defeat next and where things are. The ? key will show you how to review your progress and inspect the other players.
